generalSettings.queueName_Desc: Orchestrator queue Name. The value must match with the queue name defined on Orchestrator.
generalSettings.queueFolder_Desc: Folder name. The value must match a folder defined in Orchestrator and queue specified as OrchestratorQueueName should be created in this folder. For classic folders leave the value field empty.
generalSettings.maxRetryNumber_Desc: Must be 0 if working with Orchestrator queues. If > 0, the robot will retry the same transaction which failed with a system exception. Must be an integer value.
generalSettings.maxConsecutiveSystemExceptions_Desc: The number of consecutive system exceptions allowed. If MaxConsecutiveSystemExceptions is reached, the job is stopped. To disable this feature, set the value to 0.
generalSettings.retryNumberOrchestratorActivities_Desc: The number of times Orchestrator activities (e.g. Get Transaction Item, Set Transaction Status, Get Asset, etc.) is retried in case of an exception. Must be an integer >= 1.
generalSettings.shouldMarkJobAsFaulted_Desc: Must be TRUE or FALSE. If the value is TRUE and an error occurs in Initialization state or the maxConsecutiveSystemExceptions is reached, the job is marked as Faulted.
generalSettings.workFolderPath_Desc: Folder to store temporary files to be used by the process. Arg0: date of process run (workFolderDateFmt format). This folder will be deleted after process run and on retry.
generalSettings.bkFolderPath_Desc: Folder to store backup files. Arg0: date of process run(bkFolderDateFmt format). This folder will be deleted based on bkDays setting.
generalSettings.bkDays_Desc: Delete backup folder created before <current date> - bkDays.

assets_Desc: Assets to be retrieved from Orchestrator.
